name: PONG (itch) (Manu Pillai)
description: Pong is a table tennis–themed arcade sports video game, featuring simple two-dimensional graphics, manufactured by Atari and originally released in 1972. It was mostly an arcade game until the coming up of the mobile phones where you can play pong at your place. This game is going to give the same nostalgic feeling of arcade and the sweet'ol 90s. Watch out for that ball!
